name: GRIDHAMDAnswerOptionsVSQ10
title: GRID-HAMD Answer Options ValueSet
description: ValueSet including Q10 of the GRID-HAMD Questionnaire answer options.

concept.display: Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
Mild (some feelings of worry or irritability) and Absent or clinically insignificant
Mild (some feelings of worry or irritability) and Occasional
Mild (some feelings of worry or irritability) and Much of the time
Mild (some feelings of worry or irritability) and Almost all the time
Moderate (excessive worry or irritability; anxiety causes distress; may cause some impairment in functioning) and Occasional
Moderate (excessive worry or irritability; anxiety causes distress; may cause some impairment in functioning) and Much of the time
Moderate (excessive worry or irritability; anxiety causes distress; may cause some impairment in functioning) and Almost all the time
Severe (pervasive worry or dread; fearing the worst; apprehension obvious in demeanor or behavior; significant impairment in functioning; feelings of panic) and Occasional
Severe (pervasive worry or dread; fearing the worst; apprehension obvious in demeanor or behavior; significant impairment in functioning; feelings of panic) and Much of the time
Severe (pervasive worry or dread; fearing the worst; apprehension obvious in demeanor or behavior; significant impairment in functioning; feelings of panic)  and almost all of the time
Very Severe (incapacitating) and Much off the time
Very Severe (incapacitating) and Almost all of the time
